135868.とても高額なゴールドの 取り引きです！\n間違いがないか よく ご確認ください。:
This is a very expensive gold transaction! Please check carefully to make sure there are no mistakes. *This message will
be displayed for high value transactions. Trading game data with real money (RMT) is prohibited and will be punished.
Please be careful not to do so.
